text: "One More Try" is a 1988 song by George Michael and is the fourth single from his debut studio album Faith. It topped the single charts in Canada, Ireland and the United States. It also reached the top 20 in Austria, Belgium, Brazil, Finland, France, Iceland, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland and the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== "One More Try" #"One More Try" (album version) – 5:50 #"Look at Your Hands" – 4:36 ==References== Category:1988 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:R&B; ballads Category:Blue-eyed soul songs Category:George Michael songs Category:Joan Baez songs Category:Mariah Carey songs Category:Beverley Knight songs
title: One More Try (George Michael song)
